articles.description: The Australian number one opens his 2021 season in style, claiming the first ATP title on offer for the year as former star Bernard Tomic qualifies for the Australian Open before taking aim at his critics.
articles.content:
Alex de Minaur has opened his 2021 season in style, claiming the first ATP title on offer for the year and his fourth overall, with success at the Antalya Open in Turkey.
